mapper.insert:
insert all into master_sns_tbl values(sns_no, title, id, sns_date, sns_content) select (seq_sns_no.nextval, #{title}, #{id}, sysdate, #{sns_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
into master_sns_img_tbl (sns_no, title, id, sns_img) values(seq_sns_no.nextval, #{title}, #{id}, #{sns_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
